WorkItem.Description:
Test:
----
$reader = PHPExcel_IOFactory::createReader('Excel5');
$excel = $reader->load('read.xls');
 
$writer = PHPExcel_IOFactory::createWriter($excel, 'PDF');
$writer->save('write.pdf');
 
Expected output:
----
Nice and clean PDF export
 
Actual result:
----
There is a horizontal black line at the top of every page (and also one at the bottom, harder to see)
 
Screen shot:
----
http://img142.imageshack.us/img142/3628/writepdf.png
 
Environment:
----
PHPExcel 1.6.7 (and latest source code)
WorkItem.Summary: Black line at top of every page in output by PHPExcel_Writer_PDF
